briefTitle: Comparison of Conventional With Sonography Assisted Breast Surgery
officialTitle: Comparison of Sonographically Assisted With Conventionally Breast Surgery - Prospective, Randomised, Multicenter, Parallel Group Study With Two Study Arms
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* 18 to 70 years
* Female
* Presurgical validated breast cancer

Exclusion Criteria:

* Sonographically not defined report
* Lobular breast cancer
* Extensive ductal carcinoma in situ
